string-array.name: uv_index_low
string-array.item: Minimal risk. Safe to be outside.

string-array.name: uv_index_high
string-array.item: High risk of harm. Wear sunscreen and hat.

string-array.name: uv_index_very_high
string-array.item: Stay in shade, wear SPF 30+ and protective clothing.

string-array.name: visibility_excellent
string-array.item: Crystal clear skies, exceptionally long views.

string-array.name: visibility_good
string-array.item: Typical clear day. Easy to see distant features.

string-array.name: visibility_moderate
string-array.item: Some haze or light mist may be present.

string-array.name: visibility_poor
string-array.item: Significant haze, mist, or light fog.

string-array.name: visibility_very_poor
string-array.item: Fog, heavy mist, or smoke is present.

string-array.name: visibility_extremely_poor
string-array.item: Dense fog or thick smoke. Very limited visibility.
